definitions.definition: A perennial herb , the wormwood species Artemisia dracunculus , from Europe and parts of Asia .
The leaves of this plant (either fresh, or preserved in a vinegar / oil mixture ) used as a seasoning .

main_definition: A perennial herb , the wormwood species Artemisia dracunculus , from Europe and parts of Asia .
secondary_definitions: The leaves of this plant (either fresh, or preserved in a vinegar / oil mixture ) used as a seasoning .
